samahara deshapalakayo chandakaleta me janathawata nikan bonna denawa.thamanta balayata enna udawwuna janathawata idiriyata enna athadenna deshapalanagnyayin danaganna oona.eeth ee aya karanne meayata walakapana ekayi.indiyanu chithrapata wathujanathawa satalayit magin balanawa.eewage naluwo arakku bila wirayo wage hasirena eewa balala me ayath eewa karanawa.langadi aawa mari kiyana film eka mekata honda udaharanayak.mama lankawe chanalwalatath mewa penwanawa.mama ee ayata kathakarala kiwwa mewa penwanna epa kiyala.eyala ganan ganne naha.langadi aawa ganwathurata yatawunu biyar kompanilata aanduwa badu sahana dunna.
